text: Practice civility toward one another. Admire and emulate ethical behavior wherever you find it. Apply a rigid standard of morality to your lives; and if, periodically, you fail as you surely will, Â­adjust your lives, not the standards.  #<Author:0x007ff624f482e8>
Don't try to be perfect; Just be an excellent example of a human being. #<Author:0x007ff624d76d48>

Gratitude is the beginning of civility, of decency and goodness, of a recognition that we cannot afford to be arrogant. We should walk with the knowledge that we will need help every step of the way. #<Author:0x007ff624ce1518>

Genuine tolerance does not mean ignoring differences as if differences made no difference. Genuine tolerance means engaging differences within a bond of civility and respect. #<Author:0x007ff624d1fea8>
Civility is the art and act of caring for others. #<Author:0x007ff6244ddbc8>
Cultivate the habit of being grateful for every good thing that comes to you, and to give thanks continuously. #<Author:0x007ff622f0b7f0>
Give thanks for a little and you will find a lot. #<Author:0x007ff624f263f0>
As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them. #<Author:0x007ff623cf8cf0>
If the only prayer you ever say in your entire life is thank you, it will be enough. #<Author:0x007ff623ab34e0>
Make it a habit to tell people thank you. To express your appreciation, sincerely and without the expectation of anything in return. #<Author:0x007ff624d6ddd8>
Including people with differences is the right thing to do. #<Author:0x007ff6237901a0>
Inclusion works to the advantage of everyone. We all have things to learn and we all have something to teach. #<Author:0x007ff62349ea50>
Inclusion to me is walking up to someone and being yourself and having a full conversation with them and getting to know them as who they are. #<Author:0x007ff624bbdcb8>
It is easier to reach our potential when we learn the value of including others in our quest. #<Author:0x007ff623080a68>
Being inclusive is having a human connection without placing judgments before it. #<Author:0x007ff622fbb420>
There is no exercise better for the heart than reaching down and lifting people up. #<Author:0x007ff62499c948>
